name: send_sms
description: Send SMS message via 46elks Swedish telecommunications

arguments.name: to
arguments.desc: Recipient phone number with country code (e.g., +46XXXXXXXXX)

arguments.name: message
arguments.desc: SMS message content (max 160 characters for single SMS)

arguments.name: from
arguments.desc: Sender phone number or name (optional, uses default if not specified)

arguments.name: dry_run
arguments.desc: Test mode - verify request without sending actual SMS (optional)

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of messages to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)

arguments.name: direction
arguments.desc: Filter messages by direction: inbound, outbound, or both (default: both)

name: check_sms_status
description: Check delivery status and details of a sent SMS

arguments.name: message_id
arguments.desc: 46elks message ID returned when SMS was sent

name: check_account_balance
description: Check 46elks account balance and account information

name: estimate_sms_cost
description: Estimate cost and message segments for SMS without sending it

arguments.name: to
arguments.desc: Recipient phone number with country code

arguments.name: message
arguments.desc: SMS message content to estimate cost for

name: get_delivery_statistics
description: Get SMS delivery statistics and success rates from recent messages

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of recent messages to analyze (default: 50, max: 100)
